A mobile printer app that uses augmented reality to help users print documents in 3D. This app would allow users to easily print 3D models of their documents, making it easier to visualize and understand complex information.

A printer that uses bioprinting technology to create living documents. This would allow users to print documents on paper that is made from living organisms, such as bacteria or algae, which could be used for a variety of purposes, including medical research and environmental conservation.

A printer that uses blockchain technology to ensure the authenticity and security of printed documents. This would allow users to print documents that are tamper-proof and cannot be altered or deleted, making it ideal for industries such as finance and healthcare.

A printer that uses machine learning algorithms to automatically identify and remove irrelevant information from printed documents. This would allow users to quickly and easily focus on the most important information, making it ideal for busy professionals.

A printer that uses virtual reality technology to allow users to print documents in 360-degree environments. This would allow users to print documents that are fully immersive and can be viewed from any angle, making it ideal for industries such as gaming and entertainment.
